welcome_message_body: Welcome to Makati City, where modern skyscrapers and lively nightlife combine with rich history and cultural charm. Known as the financial center of the Philippines, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant city has to offer.

restaurants.name: ALFRED at Makati Diamond Residences
restaurants.description: ALFRED at Makati Diamond Residences is a restaurant located in Makati City.
restaurants.address: Ground Floor, Makati Diamond Residences (118 Legazpi Street), Makati, Makati City

restaurants.name: Escolta
restaurants.description: Escolta is a filipino restaurant located in Makati City.
restaurants.address: The Peninsula Manila, Ayala Ave (Makati Ave), 1226 Makati City, Makati City

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
